# Universal Solvent
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** —

**Price** 50 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This substance has the unique property of being able to dissolve *[[Sovereign Glue|sovereign glue]]*, tanglefoot bags, and all other adhesives. Applying the solvent is a standard action.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Acid Arrow (Spell)|acid arrow]]*

**Cost** 25 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 532
